execution_quality: Clean and efficient execution with no errors. The agent made 5 focused edits across the codebase and verified the changes with a test run.
work_category: Bug fix implementation in a grocery list application. The agent made targeted edits to resolve an issue that had been previously identified.
summary: The agent efficiently fixed the identified bug through targeted edits and verification. The user's follow-up question suggests the fix was appropriate but indicates they want to clarify scope on a related feature, showing this was a well-executed but narrowly-scoped task that may have adjacent work remaining.
follow_up_pattern: User is clarifying scope - asking whether a related feature request (replacing 'out of stock' with unit type/size) is part of the current issue or a separate one. This indicates normal iteration and scope clarification.
